评论详情: Love this sweater so much. I own it in several colors.
This is a beyond gorgeous sweater.
I was super excited for this, but discovered that it fits REALLY SMALL.  It’s like it’s made for a child.  The sweater is really nice, just really small.  Unfortunately, I’m going to return it.
Fit is as described and super soft, quality, lightweight. Great value

This sweater is sooo soft and light weight. The fit was good, however the bind-off edge at the neck ribbing was not very stretchy.  I had adequate room to pull the sweater on over my head, but it will either brush over your face or your hair. I’m used to necklines being stretchy enough to avoid your hair and face. (Small inconvenience ) Still, it’s a beautiful sweater!
Very soft.  Beautiful true navy color.  Bought a size up for comfort.
This sweater fits great and it’s so soft!! I really appreciate the quality. I was pleasantly surprised with this Amazon clothing purchase

评论概述: It really does come from China
评论详情: The color is great. The fit is perfect. The material is soft and doesn't itch at all.  I bought a size larger than my usual based on reviews. And I am glad I did. It is a little large, but I like it that way. It ships within a couple of days of ordering. But the company doesn't have a warehouse in USA. It is really straight from China. So it takes about 3 weeks to get to you.

Sweater seemed nice enough, jet black, good fit.. L.. I'm 137#... Wore first to a event. Next time to wear I noticed a small hole in the left sleeve. So disappointed. And I was long past the 30 day return. So this way over priced sweater will be a throw on to keep warm, not something pretty to dress up in. Third time I put on another hole 🤷

I love the material. It’s so soft it fits perfectly. I love it paired with a button up underneath. I have worn it with jeans and dresses. I love that. It’s not too thick but yet it still keeps me warm. It is the perfect thickness. The color is a very vibrant but not overpowering yellow so I really Enjoy the color. And I have washed it and it has not peeled.

评论概述: Super cute but not the highest quality
评论详情: Love this sweater and got a bunch of compliments on it. It’s super soft but after two wears (before washing) the seam in the armpit has begun to unravel
I love the color of this sweater! It fits perfectly (size M) and is very soft.
Nice color, but very thin and fits on the small, snug side.
Bought an XL but sized more like a medium. I use it as a winter undershirt but can't wear it alone.
Strong chemical smell. After 3 washes, smell still remains.

I wore this sweater and others like it on a winter vacation. It kept me warm but noticed it balling. I sent to the cleaner in hopes it would improve the look  I got it came back as I sent it. Other sweaters bought from Nordstrom still looked great in comparison. Definitely a shame for I feel I can not wear these items again

I am 5'7" chest 34B and a true medium.  Too small over all. The sleeves are too short, the arms are tight and the body length is much shorter than the picture.  I would definitely go up a size in this if you don't want it to be tight on you.  The girl in the picture is probably petite. The fabric felt nice!

Nicer than I expected! Perfect mid weight and very soft. I can wear it alone without a tee under it and not itch at all. And I’m the type who can’t stand scratchy clothes- I have to cut the tags out of everything bc I can feel every little scratch, even the little corners if I don’t cut the tag out properly. Runs a size small. I normally wear medium in sweaters but I got a large and it fit like a medium. If it’s too big you can mist it with a spray bottle of water and dry it for a minute. But if it’s too small you’re stuck. I’m 5’5” 125# for reference. I now have 2 of these and will order another if they go on sale again.
Kept me warm in cold Korea recently.  Love the color!  Only a bit fuzzy but easy to wash and hang dry.

Since fabric descriptions on Amazon are often misleading, I was surprised to find that this sweater is actually wool and the softest merino wool at that. It almost feels like cashmere. I’m usually an M or L in most brands but since I wanted a looser fit I went with an XL.  I’m very happy with this sweater.
Beautiful, my daughter looks amazing. We bought it XL for a baggy look but should it just got her size. She is small or a medium but the sweater still looks nice on her.

Everyone should have a go-to black sweater like this one. It's lightweight but warm and the merino wool is soft against your skin. It's classic and versatile enough to work in both business and more casual settings. I sized up for a more loose fit since they run a touch on the small side as others have noted. A perfect wardrobe staple.
The color is true, the feel is luxurious, but the sweater is cut small. If you want room in the sweater, buy one or two sizes up.  It’s worth the price though.
It is a very warm sweater. It started pilling after wearing it only twice. This made the sweater look cheap and unattractive. So disappointed.
Love it.  Size is as expected and I am happy!

评论概述: It's not the sale color AD described...
评论详情: This sweater is not the same color as the AD described.... It looks little darker...
I have not worn the sweater yet but it feels soft and the color is exactly the same as shown on line.  I am very pleased with this purchase.
It is a very pretty color but the extra large is actually a medium size.
Except it took foreeever to get here. If you need right away, find something else. Otherwise, I’m pleased and it’s one of my favs

Lovely sweater, very soft, the color pink is beautiful. I do recommend this product. Lovely. Fits well I ordered an x-large size, valued for money. Although is made in China but I wished it was made in our old U.S.A.
So far so good, we’ll see how much it pills. But the color is what I was looking for and the fit is very good.
This sweatshirt is soft and so comfortable. The fit is perfect and washes well. It fits true to size.

This one is much thinner than the SAME products I purchased in winter 2023, with the ORIGINAL brand name: LINY XIN. The fabric of previous version (with brand name LINY XIN) is much better! It looks like the whole product line continues, however, the fabric has been changed.
Quality is so good and it keeps you warm. Color and style is best.
Very soft, true to color in website, and good fit. Excellent quality for the price. Buying two more in other colors.

评论概述: The quality is great!! I love it!
评论详情: I like it a lot and I would love to order more of this sweater in different colors. I hope that after it has been washed it will still look great.
I normally wear a small, and this fits perfectly! It’s a lovely color ( pink).
El sweater color caramelo nome gustó el color es muy apagado muy deprimente, la verdad nada que ver c la foto que enseñan, es delgado ligero y calientito pero el color es horrible
I bought the caramel color. I love it! The sweater is soft and a classic, timeless style. A great addition to my wardrobe! I will be buying more in the future.
Cold or cool weather.  Soft and light weight, not bulky, which I like.  Pretty lavender color, not scratchy.
Beautiful, fits well at normal size.

Literally exactly like the high end sweaters you’ll find at department stores for hundreds of dollars. This store is the biggest score on Amazon this fall/winter season !! I want all the colors but highly recommend the red
This wool sweater works well for me and fits well. Thank you. It is warm, lightweight and good quality. Thank you.

评论概述: A staple in my fall/winter wardrobe
评论详情: I have purchased this in 5 colors so far and love the merino wool.  So light and soft on the skin and colors are vibrant and saturated.  Some people think it’s cashmere.  Highly recommend and the quality is high and beautiful

The color described/portrayed is NOT the actual color of sweater. More of a greenish/brownish color. Not a carmel color. Disappointed. It is a lightweight sweater, soft for wool, sleeves are nice n long and fit accordingly

评论概述: Soft and such a pretty color
评论详情: Sometimes when the picture shows red, it ends up being more warm toned than I like.. this is a “cool” red. It fits perfectly and is very warm.. I ended up buying 3.

The online photo made this look like a pink sweater. When the product arrived, we discovered that it was red, not pink, and was not solid red either. The sweater was composed of red and white patches that were apparently supposed to look like pink from a distance. Awful idea, and it looked dreadful and nothing like the online photo.

评论概述: Fair price for a wool sweat
评论详情: I am very happy with this sweater, although it is a bit thinner than I wanted. Wore in cold weather on a river cruise and it kept me warm. I ordered the blue and like the color. Will definitely keep in my cedar chest to hopefully keep it from getting holes.
The colors are beautiful and the touch is very soft.  These run quite small, and they could not be made of merino wool...nothing like it.  Price is very reasonable, but you get what you pay for.

Love the color (I got the yellow), super soft, thin, but warm. This is my fourth sweater from Chanyarn and I love them. Outstanding value for quality wool I have one sweater in a large and a couple in XL to provide a looser fit.  I usually fit in a medium, but mediums are fitted on me (I am American size 10/12).
Don’t buy! Not worth the price.made in China 😡
I haven’t worn it yet but it’s beautiful.  You can’t tell it’s not cashmere.  I hope it doesn’t pill like cheap cashmere.  It will need to be hand washed.

I have many pieces of clothing that are Merino wool.  This feels different but still nice.  My issue is that this is too small so remember that when you purchase.  I’m trying to return but it’s going to be a pain to return because of the delay in refund.

The fit is perfect I followed reviews and ordered one size up. It is a classic. Soft against the skin. I bought khaki and it matches the description It's nice warm medium brown. Not gold like the picture. The quality is top notch. I will buy more colors
Exactly what I needed for autumn in France and Spain.
This is a gift for my sister. It’s so soft and the color is true to photo online. She wears a small/ medium  and it appears as though it will fit her. Thinking about getting one for myself!
It is exactly what I wanted. The wool thread is thin so the pullover is like a shirt.
Nicely made, good shape.
The instructions tell you to hand wash it, but I washed it in the machine with cold water on the Delicates setting and dried on the Air Fluff dry mode (no heat), and no shrinkage.
Beautiful sweater for a reasonable price.  Warm, soft, lightweight.  Definitely nice for multiple occasions.

I love wool! Quality wool is expensive and can be rough on the skin.  This was a great price, looks good, and doesn't irritate the skin! Also, the color is exactly as advertised.  Will be perfect for winter travel.  This is a great buy!

I was so excited to get this sweater. I loved the Fall mustard color and fit but after wearing this sweater a total of TWO times, it is already majorly pilling and looks like it is close to falling apart. Zero value for your money. Highly disappointing.
I bought the caramel in a M. True to size. Very soft and cozy. I don't know about the durability yet. But hope it will last at least the season. Very pretty. I ordered two more...

评论概述: Advertised as Cashmere but is Superfine Merino
评论详情: It's a nice top. Buy I was expecting as advertised Cashmere (atleast a blend) and it's Superfine merino wool : a soft, fine, and elegant yarn or fabric made from the wool of specially bred sheep...that said I like the top. Runs small so up a size for true fit. Nice and warm and close fitting to the body. Well made.
Beautiful color, soft, Easy to pair with Sweater, well made, fit as advertised, and of course: arrived on time!
I bought the XL and it fits true to size. Typically a size 14/16 with 42" bust.  Very soft and flattering fit. Good quality for the price.
Soft and fit well. Not too loose or tight in any particular area. Thin but still warm. Happy with purchase!

It is a light-weight sweater and very soft.  Thin enough to be worn as an under garment.  Sized a little on the small size, especially the sleeves.  The color variation of the threads is not as pronounced as seen in the picture, so it looks very plain.  If worn as an undergarment it would be a pretty pricey one, but as a good quality wool sweater it's a good value.

This is a perfectly decent light weight sweater. I bought it for my air conditioned office. It tucks into slacks or skirts nicely, and is great with jeans. I am 5'6", 150 lbs, 36B, usually a medium in US sizes. I bought a large in the color "tan", to see if it matched the taupe in the photo or the description. It's somewhere in between - I would err on the description side of things. If you want a relaxed fit, or if you are large breasted, go up a size or two.

This is a nice quality mid grade merino sweater. The sweater is fairly soft and only mildly itchy. The color is an attractive bright cream. The sweater fits true to size with a slight dolman sleeve. The length hits about 1.5 inches below the natural waist. It's a nice neutral piece to have in your wardrobe that can be dressed up or down. It is perfect for fall days or summer evenings or for layering in the winter.
This is soft like Cashmere. The color is as advertised. It is light weight thus easy and comfortable to wear. I wear a medium but XL fits me better on this brand.

This is a very comfortable, soft sweater with a nice classic look (goes great with black work pants). You can dress it up or dress it down, making it a versatile wardrobe addition. With that being said, it is hand wash only so even though it's a versatile piece I'll likely not wear it frequently since I don't care for hand washing my clothing. Other than that, I have absolutely no complaints about it. The quality is decent. It's not as soft as some of the other Merino wool sweaters I have, but it is still soft enough to be very comfortable. I ordered it in red and the color is nice and vibrant and the sweater fits true to size. If you like the style, this is a nice sweater at a decent value.
I liked it a lot. It's soft and comfy, and it fits well!

My wife loves this sweater, she says that "it is so beautiful, classy, elegant looking and soft. It is one of those staple pieces that everyone should have.  I absolutely love the look and feel of this sweater. Highly recommend!"  I think that it fits her just right and I love how soft it is.  Both of my daughters want it for themselves but I think mom will win out.  Great gift for my wife.
The images are not accurate. The neckline and sweater is a standard crew. The wool is a bit heavier and less soft than expected. It is still a nice sweater, just not as described.

评论概述: Beautiful color but a little tight
评论详情: The sweater is beautiful and I love the color but it fits a little tight. I normally wear and XL but I should have gone up a size. The wool is nice and it is a good thickness.

评论概述: Cozy sweater perfect for the Fall!
评论详情: I recently received this 100% Merino wool crewneck sweater, and I'm thrilled with it. The material is incredibly soft, and the color is absolutely perfect for the fall season. I can't wait to wear it as the weather cools down. I have not washed it yet, but is does say to hand wash and no dryer.  Because I haven't worn it I cannot comment on its long-term durability. Overall, a great addition to my fall wardrobe!  I wish they wouldn't have placed the tag on the side of the sweater as it creates a little indention on the sweater.

Wow, this sweater exceeds my expectations. The wool is soft, the knit is thin but not cheap-feeling, and the color is simply beautiful.  The fit is slim, so if you want a looser fit, order up a size.  I haven't washed mine yet, but I will update my review if it shrinks or pills excessively after a delicate wash and air dry.

评论概述: Good price for a soft wool sweater
评论详情: Pleasantly surprised by this sweater. Soft, cozy, and lightweight. I have an slim athletic build (5'6", muscular, 135lbs) but have very broad shoulders so usually wear a M or L to make sure my shoulders fit. I ordered a large and the shoulders are perfect without the arms being huge (which is a plus). The body is loose and casual which is just fine with me. Great for layering.  I hand-washed it in Eucalan wool wash with a small squirt of hair conditioner for softness and it came out great. I'm not sure how it will hold up but I've ordered two others because you can't beat this price point for wool.

评论概述: Soft and comfortable and true to size
评论详情: I ordered the black sweater in my typical size of medium and it fits perfectly and is flattering. Wool can be so itchy and this sweater is soft and comfortable and light weight, but it will be warm and a good basic wardrobe staple. I am going on a fall trip to Europe and it will be perfect to pack in case the weather gets chilly and is thin enough to easily layer with a denim jacket or coat without being bulky. Merino wool is perfect for travel as it can be worn many times without washing. I am interested in buying it in beige or other color options. I thought the description was very accurate and it comes in a nice variety of colors.

I recently got the Chanyarn Women's 100% Merino Wool Crewneck Sweater, and it has quickly become one of my favorite pieces. The merino wool is incredibly soft and comfortable, making it perfect for cooler days. The seamless knit gives it a sleek, flattering fit that looks great with both casual and more dressed-up outfits. The khaki color is versatile and pairs well with almost everything in my wardrobe. The quality feels top-notch, and it keeps me warm without being too bulky. This sweater has definitely elevated my fall and winter wardrobe.

This sweater is perfect for fall.  It's not too thick but it's warm and well made.  I ordered a size small and it is a perfect fit.  It hangs nicely, not too clingy and the stitching is well done.  The only reason I gave it 4 stars is that the merino is a bit rough -- it's a little scratchy on the skin.  But it looks really nice on.

评论概述: Cozy and Light, Be Aware of Shrinkage
评论详情: It is a very warm, cozy shirt, and quite light as advertised. My one complaint is that it shrunk to the point that the sleeves are uncomfortably tight and short. I got a small following the size chart. It did fit fine before washing.  I would consider sizing up. I do think the sleeves are just kind of on the smallish size. I'm 5'3", 120 lbs, bust 33", waist 27", hips 37" for reference. I don't know my arm dimensions, but they are somewhat thicker but average length for a typical small.  I washed it in the washing machine in a lingerie bag in cold water and hung it to dry. It did feel noticeably itchy before washing, but after one wash it lost all its itchiness completely and feels pretty soft. Not a terrible option for a 100% Merino wool shirt, but keep some shrinkage in mind when choosing a size.

Took a while to get here, but it was definitely worth the wait! I used the sizing chart and got the medium (which is my normal size.) It fits like the model photos and true to size. The sweater is not super thick but definitely warm as expected. VERY soft for a wool sweater! I got the red color, and it is exactly like the photos. Looking forward to wearing it this winter!

评论概述: Casual lightweight and warm fabric, but it's a little scratchy.
评论详情: This is a really nice sweater! It's a great basic addition to a cold weather wardrobe - perfect for layering. I LOVE the caramel color. It's exactly as pictured. It's a little scratchy, but it is 100% merino wool so that's to be expected. It's totally fine with an under shirt on though. Because of the fine yarn, it has a surprising amount if stretch to it.  For size reference, I'm 5'7", 125 lbs, 34B chest, and I ordered a small. It fits me very nicely. It's even long enough for my long torso! I haven't washed it yet, but the seams appear to be sewn strongly and I'm not worried about it falling apart with normal wear. The tag says hand wash and hag dry only.

I really love this sweater!! Here’s why I believe this product deserves a five-star review:  Pros:  Luxurious Material: The 100% Merino wool is incredibly soft and comfortable against the skin. It’s warm yet lightweight, making it perfect for layering during cooler months or wearing on its own in milder weather.  Seamless Knit: The seamless design adds to the comfort and elegance of this sweater. It has a sleek, smooth finish that looks polished and sophisticated, whether paired with jeans for a casual look or dressed up with a skirt.  High-Quality Craftsmanship: The attention to detail in this sweater is evident. The knit is tight and even, ensuring durability and a long-lasting fit. It feels like a high-end piece that will hold up well over time.  Versatile Style: The classic crewneck design and timeless style make this sweater a versatile addition to any wardrobe. It’s easy to mix and match with different outfits, making it a go-to piece for both casual and more formal occasions.  Warm and Breathable: Despite its warmth, the Merino wool is naturally breathable, ensuring that I stay comfortable throughout the day. It’s a great choice for anyone looking for a sweater that provides warmth without overheating.  Cons:  Runs on the Small Side: The fit runs a bit on the small side, so I would recommend sizing up for a more comfortable fit, especially if you prefer a slightly looser look. However, once I adjusted for the sizing, the fit was perfect.  Overall, the Women's 100% Merino Wool Crewneck Sweater is an excellent purchase for anyone looking for a luxurious, versatile, and high-quality sweater.
Love this sweater! Bought the caramel color in a size small- I’m 5ft 8in and weigh 140lbs and the fit is great.  The material is very soft and well made. Would definitely recommend to others
Such a beautiful sweater, great quality I can't wait for the weather to cool down so that I can wear it. I love the color and the fit. Extremely comfortable and like I said before beautiful.

评论概述: Soft and luxurious. Looks more expensive.
评论详情: Price during review- $47.99  Gorgeously soft wool sweater that looks and feels like a much more expensive that the under $50 price tag it carries. It is described as being authentic soft brushed 100% Merino wool and I well believe it. It feels so good and is light enough for a stunning addition to your fall wardrobe. I appreciate the colors available and by far, Tan is the one I like the most. Totally worth it. Recommended.

This is a nice, lightweight (thin) Merino wool sweater. It will be great in fall temps or over a thin base layer and under a full jacket.  It’s a very basic sweater - no special details or adornments. Sometimes, that’s all you need.  The blue is nice and the small is true to size - if you want to be able to layer more under this sweater or prefer a looser fit you may want to size up.  Washed it in my sink and dried flat and it held up well.

I ordered an XL for an oversized fit but since I'm top heavy I don't think it'll give me the oversize fit. If you have a small chest, or just overall slim, it'll fit cute though! It's super soft though and the Caramel color is so nice!
My daughter likes this top a lot. She says it's well made, and very comfortable. Size chart was accurate.
Very nice sweter, cozy and warm. I didn’t wash it yet so I don’t know how it’ll look like after. I recommend

das Produkt kann ich gar nicht gebrauchen. Bei der Bestellung sollte ersichtlich sein, dass es ein chinesisches Produkt ohne Rücksendemöglichkeit innerhalb Europas ist. Amazon sollte pmm keine Plattform mehr bieten (Produkte war zu klein, kratzig und roch schlecht). Das Geld ist trotz Nachlassangebot für mich verloren
Warum ist die Größe nicht im Pullover angebracht. Macht mich stutzig. Mir passt die L sonst. Ärgerlich! Rücksendung musste ich bezahlen
Pullover anders da gestellt als auf dem Foto Material okay

I bought the caramel colour first & loved the feel of the light merino wool. And it's not too hot. Feels a bit like cashmere. Chan Yarns did a good job with this mock turtle neck style. Great for fall. I'm going to check out the Cardigan now.
